biotools.summary: With this tool you can calculate Elementary Conversion Modes (ECMs) from metabolic networks. Combinations of ECMs form all metabolic influence an organism can exert on its environment.

bioschemas.name: ecmtool
bioschemas.summary: With this tool you can calculate Elementary Conversion Modes (ECMs) from metabolic networks. Combinations of ECMs form all metabolic influence an organism can exert on its environment.
